bibl.title: Hermes Aegyptiacus. Egyptological Studies for B.H. Stricker on his 85th Birthday
bibl.note: For each of the components of the Papremis ritual illustration can be found in Late Temple liturgies.
BORGHOUTS J.F., Rethinking the Papremis Ritual (Herodotus II. 63).
Terence DUQUESNE (Ed.), Hermes Aegyptiacus. Egyptological Studies for B.H. Stricker on his 85th Birthday = Discussions in Egyptology. Special Number. 2 (Oxford, 1995) pp. 43-52.
